website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, perfectly sized for child-sized arms, and easy to operate, the Spiderbolt is an engaging Spider-Man themed Nerf blaster that is great for pretend super-hero playtime.
pros: Extremely easy for small children to load and fire
Upgradable with Web Shots Gear expansions
cons: Not the most powerful Nerf blaster

customer_reviews.title: Call me J. Jonah Jameson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to cause jealousy from my 27 year old son Jesse. I’ve used it around the house numerous times, always in plain sight of him. His anger and frustration of not having one makes my long days at the soon to be closed graphite mill I work at more fun. Recently I have been attached sticky notes that say “Get a job” and “Move out Slacker” to the end of the darts and have been shooting them directly at him. Great buy. Will probably buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: RuffPops21

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed. Bought it for my son's bday. Darts dont go so far, hard for a six year old to cock, and directions were insufficient.
customer_reviews.author: George Lynch

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TOY!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old grandson, and it was a hit with his sister, and some of the adults at the party! The foam darts shoot a LONG ways, and the shooter is sturdy. I had to ask how to shoot it, not realizing you had to pull back to cock it, but once I knew how to do it, it was a blast!
customer_reviews.author: JW in NM

customer_reviews.title: No power
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the spider man shooting concept from his hand but the power of the bullets are terrible. Prob 1 tenth the power of a regular nerf gun.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Mc Cullagh

customer_reviews.title: The Webbing snapped after only a couple weeks of play
customer_reviews.text: It has this weird band that wraps uncomfortably around your child's arm. The band relies on a couple of plastic nubs to keep the thing from falling off. The webbing snapped and after that broke the coolness factor was gone. You pull the thing back to ready it for shooting but then the button to let the dart shoot is in the middle of the top. It's a cool looking toy but doesn't function at all like a bow and arrow, it also doesn't function like a nerf gun. It's flimsy and broke long before I wrote this review.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sevilla

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to hold and shoot
customer_reviews.text: This is poorly designed. My 6 year old son is a nerf fanatic and this seemed like a win being paired with Spider-Man. But it’s not. It’s awkward to hold and you have to use another hand to shoot it. I wouldn’t buy it again and it’s the one he uses the least. It’s so odd they made it like this with no way to fire it using the hand that you have the gun mounted on. It would not be a good pick to be in a nerf war with. Positives are it is sturdy and has bright colors and the Spider-Man look.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane

customer_reviews.title: Not The Best, Not The Worst
customer_reviews.text: Our family is familiar with many a kind of 'nerf' shooter. This one is not the best, but it's not the worst either. It's a little bulky and unsteady on the arm. It's difficult for an adult to pull, let alone a young kiddo. There are better guns out there, and even my Spiderman enthusiast doesn't care to pick this one up to play with. Just go for the tommy gun. You know the one.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves pretending she is Spider Girl with this awesome toy. We've had it for several months and it's still in great shape. We bought extra darts to go with it and it has provided hours of fun and surprise attacks on Daddy. This is a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy for children. My son loves the nerf guns but has always had problems because he is younger having the strength to actual load the gun. This on the other hand is extremely easy to use and he can do it by his self! It had held up extremely well. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Nothing spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Kept my 5 year old grandsons entertained for a few minutes right out of the box. They’ve not played with them much since. Arrived as promised and are as described, just not really a spectacular toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: Whoa, pretty cool, per 7yr.old
customer_reviews.text: Just the accessory our g-son wanted to maximize his Spider-Man costume for Halloween this year. He was able to assemble in minutes, and making points with the neighborhood kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with how little this does. My son broke the web on one side the first day not even trying. I thought it would be able to shoot with one hand, but it takes both hands- one to hold and one to cock it and shoot. You can only load one of the three nerf darts at a time. Pretty basic for the price point in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: The toy quality is fine. But the design is terrible. The way you shoot the nerf darts is so akward it's impossible for my children to use. The button to shoot is on the top but there is no way to comfortably hold and press the button and have it still work. Your hand is always in the way of it firing. I would recommend a different style nerf gun over this any day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8-yr old grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was on a wishlist my daughter made for her 8-yr old. I got it for him for Christmas, he was thrilled, and the rest of us dodged Nerf darts until he tired of it and moved on to the next present. :)
customer_reviews.author: JaggedOne

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for a 3 yr old diehard spiderman fan
customer_reviews.text: He had trouble shooting the darts initially but has since got the hang of the thing. However I must note that his fave is still the 2 dollar mini nerf gun. Easier for him to aim and handle. And fits in his pocket. The wow factor on opening the gift was there but follow up play not so much
customer_reviews.author: christalm

customer_reviews.title: Cool per 5 year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Got as Christmas gift for my 5 year old grandson as a replacement for another one that was too hard for him to figure out. He loves it. First thing he said when he seen it was oh cool
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome;great quality;better in person
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my nephew! He loved it! I almost wanted to keep it with how awesome it was when I got it! Good quality! He opened it immediately! A lot better in person! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son for Christmas. It’s absolutely perfect. He loves Spider-Man and this was perfect for him. It fits well in his hands without problems. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came on time was super cool looking i liled the rubber webs so they can stretch! Got this for my nephew for christmas and he loves spiderman it made his whole day to open this up
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Long

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kid's gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this so this was the perfect gift for him. And I only paid $10 for it over a lighting deal here. Can't complain. Well built and durable
customer_reviews.author: G Ubinas

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son saw this at Target and wanted get it for his friends birthday, Amazon's price was cheaper so we got it. His friend's mom told my wife he loves it. So we decided to get my son one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: good size for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good haven't test it cause it's for my son birthday in Nov but it is from nerf..
customer_reviews.author: melissa truelove

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: My great nephew loved it. At first he wanted the punching bag I originally got him . But I read the reviews on it and didn't buy another one. The first one had a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerhowie

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 3 BULLETS INCLUDED
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with children knows 3 bullets isn't enough... 2 were lost before Christmas presents were done being opened 😐. Not a lot of power so it was perfect for my 4 year old nephew. Reccomend, just get more bullets!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Happy Child
customer_reviews.text: Seven year old likes it. It's the only one he can shoot at people due to the soft impact is has. Doesn't hurt even at close range. He is a Spider-man fan and is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: vss542

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to pull back.
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice and sturdy. Fun to play with. Easier to pull back than some nerf guns, accommodates younger children better.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy this again
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing. Bought for gift and wish I had returned it. Not fun enough, all looks and not much play.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Not a hit with my 6 year old grandson. the band was not easy for him to adjust around his wrist and it was not amusing for him.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: my little nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a birthday gift for my 5 year old nephew. Very nice, sturdy and good value for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gift for a child who loves Spider-Man. Gave it as a gift to my little cousin and he loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift and made for one happy boy. Great price so I was able to get several pieces for this set

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for her brothers 3rd birthday and he absolutely LOVES it!! Great quality and he can use it with ease alone.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!

customer_reviews.title: Spider enemies beware!

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The darts would not shoot out of the shooter. Poor quality product. Do not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My little boy absolutely loved getting this for Christmas. It's easy to use and he loves that its spiderman

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift. It was a great gift! My grandson loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Nerf gun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! It only comes with three darts though, a few more would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ann T

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the hammer is pretty hard for my newly 5 year old to pull back, not impossible, just hard. He's younger than the recommended age though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: The location of the trigger is in a very awkward position making it difficult to shoot. You have to reach on top to shoot and avoid the recoil from the charging handle. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Different but fun nerf gun
customer_reviews.text: Really a cool neftgun usea standard bullets and my son really loves it

product_meta.title: Spider-Man Web Shots Spiderbolt Nerf Powered Blaster Toy for Kids Ages 5 & Up
product_meta.description:
Imagine swinging into the newest Spider-Man Adventure with Spider-Man figures, vehicles, and role-play items inspired by Spider-Man: far from home. With this movie-inspired line of toys, kids can imagine the web-slinging, wall-crawling action as Spider-Man faces new challenges and new villains. Additional products each sold separately. Subject to availability.
with the web shots spiderbolt blaster, kids can imagine gearing up with a web-styled blaster inspired by Spider-Man and his awesome inventions. Launch Nerf darts and imagine Spider-Man battling his enemies! Plus, attach the spiderbolt blaster to any of the Web shots gear (each sold separately. Subject to availability) For even more blasting action!

copyright 2018 Marvel. Copyright cpii.
feature_bullets: Spider-man-inspired blaster – Peter Parker is an inventive teen whose Tech Skills Help him develop gear like his iconic web shooters. Inspired by Spider-Man inventiveness, web shots gear lets kids imagine blasting enemies with a web-powered blaster.

Powered by Nerf – the Spider-Man web shots spiderbolt blaster comes with 3 nerf darts so when kids pull back the handle and push the button they can launch darts and imagine using a web-powered blast to take on the villains of the Marvel universe. Additional darts sold separately.

Sling webs in style – inspired by the look of Spider-Man: far from home, the web shots spiderbolt blaster has web-detailing and spider-inspired design so kids can imagine gearing up with web-powered equipment.

Compatible with web shots gear – connect the web shots spiderbolt blaster to any of the Web shots gear, The twist Strike, the disc Slinger, or the scatterblast blasters (each old separately. Subject to availability) to blast in different combinations!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,306 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
